text: Erik Anders Allardt (9 August 1925 – 25 August 2020) was a Finnish sociologist. Allardt was professor of sociology at the University of Helsinki between 1955 and 1991, and as chancellor of Åbo Akademi University between 1992 and 1994. He was born in Helsinki. He was elected a member of the Academia Europaea in 1988. Allardt died on 25 August 2020 in Helsinki at the age of 95. ==Related pages== *List of sociologists from Europe ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1925 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Scientists from Helsinki Category:European sociologists Category:Members of Academia Europaea
